meaningMnemonic: <radical>Someone</radical>s and <radical>building</radical>s, someones and buildings, someones and buildings. So many someones and buildings. With so many someones and buildings, we have ourselves a <kanji>metropolis</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: In this <kanji>metropolis</kanji> everything is a <reading>toe</reading> (と). The someones are toes, walking around. The buildings are toes, too.
